Package com.ualberta.cs.alfred

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Address
    Address class which stores details of the address.
    AddressTest
    Creates the type Address test.
    BuildClient
    This class is used to create and initialize a client to connect to the elastic search server used for Alfred.
    Driver
    This class is used to create and initialize a driver that will be used to represent a user in Driver Mode.
    DriverInfo
    This class is used differentiate the explicit driver data that will be stored seperate from the same user's rider data.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumentation test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    LoginController
    This class is used to check whether a user a user exists and is able to log in under the specified domain which they are requesting.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity is the first activity which the user sees if there is no user currently logged in in the cache.
    MainActivityTest
    Created by mmcote on 2016-10-09.
    MainScreenActivity  
    MenuActivity  
    Request
    Holds information related to requests
    RequestDetailsActivity
    Created by Shelley on 2016-11-11.
    RequestElasticSearchController
    Request Controller for Elasticsearch
    RequestElasticSearchController.AddItemToListTask
    Add new item to property that has a type "array" in ES Note: need to supply the request ID, property name and the string item to be added
    RequestElasticSearchController.AddRequestTask
    The type Add request task.
    RequestElasticSearchController.DeleteItemFromListTask
    Deletes item from the elasticsearch server
    RequestElasticSearchController.DeleteRequestTask
    Delete request by id task.
    RequestElasticSearchController.GetRequestByIdTask
    Gets requests by id task.
    RequestElasticSearchController.GetRequestTask
    Get request task.
    RequestElasticSearchController.SetNestedObjectPropertyValueTask
    Add new item to property that has a type "array" in ES Note: need to supply the request ID, property name and the string item to be added
    RequestElasticSearchController.SetPropertyValueTask
    This task update the value of a property in ES.
    RequestElasticSearchControllerTest
    The type Request elastic search controller test.
    RequestList
    Creates the type RequestList.
    RequestListTest
    Creates all the test cases for type RequestList.
    RequestTest
    Creates all the test cases for Request
    Rider
    This class is used to create and initialize a rider to be used in Rider Mode, this is a subclass of User, with it's opposite being a Driver.
    RiderTest
    Create all the test cases for Request
    SignUpActivity  
    SplashActivity
    The type Splash activity.
    User
    The user class holds all of the common data needed as both a rider and a driver.
    UserCache
    cache used to store user data while offline
    UserCacheController
    This user cache is used to store the user cache generated from the last use of the application.
    UserElasticSearchController
    This controller holds the functionality to add and get users from the elastic search server.
    UserElasticSearchController.AddUser<T>
    adds users to elasticsearch server
    UserElasticSearchController.GetDriverInfo
    This class is used to run an AsyncTask in the background to get driver info of a user from the elastic search server.
    UserElasticSearchController.GetRider
    This class is used to run an AsyncTask in the background to get a rider from the elastic search server.
    UserTest
    Creates the test cases for type User.
